pipes.name: Users
pipes.description: Basecamp users will be imported as Toggl users. Existing users are matched by e-mail.

pipes.name: Projects
pipes.description: Basecamp projects will be imported as Toggl projects. Existing projects are matched by name.

pipes.name: Todo lists
pipes.description: Basecamp todolists will be imported as Toggl tasks. Existing tasks are matched by name.

pipes.name: Todos
pipes.description: Basecamp todos will be imported as Toggl tasks. Existing tasks are matched by name.

pipes.name: Users
pipes.description: Freshbooks users will be imported as Toggl users. Existing users are matched by e-mail.

pipes.name: Projects
pipes.description: Freshbooks projects will be imported as Toggl projects. Existing projects are matched by name.

pipes.name: Tasks
pipes.description: Freshbooks tasks will be imported as Toggl tasks. Existing tasks are matched by name.

pipes.name: Time entries
pipes.description: Toggl time entries that are assigned to Freshbooks tasks will be exported your Freshbooks timesheet.
